name: Soda Jerk
description:
People come to your concession stand to get sodas. But you like giving them the wrong one, 'cause you're a jerk.  Just don't get caught—when the boss is around, you need to give people the CORRECT drink. Time to cut your losses and make this the jerkiest day ever!

Controls: use the mouse to drag bottles to the customers. Click anywhere to advance in menu screens.

Made in 3 hours for Trijam #195.

Created by fractal cherries. Sounds and music are from Splice.
